name: Blazing
description:
Welcome to the Blazing Festival ! 

We are happy to see you on this festival. You obviously are here to have a good time, so go ahead !
Have fun, meet new friends, try new experiences.
Do whatever you want but keep in mind this festival isn't approve so there is no police fighter or ambulance to help you if you are in bad shape.

See you in 3 days :) ... or not !

All festival crew are not responsible for any injuries.
